item.title: ICT.OPEN 2025
item.description: I spoke at ICT.OPEN 2025 about a joint work with Cas Oude Hoekstra on predicting conditional percentiles with fully transparent models using the pinball loss and symbolic regression. More to follow soon hopefully!
